Text: Mmm... Where am I?
...A classroom? There's no one here.

I know I dozed off...but didn't think I was that
deep of a sleeper. *sigh* Better get back to the
dorms...

(Hmm, not a soul in sight. Doesn't seem like another
band of terrorists has taken over the school either,
though...)
(Maybe I'm...dreaming?)
Oh dear, lost our way, have we?
Huh? Violet?
Yes, it's me, Violet. Hello.
Hello yourself. Never thought I'd run into you here.

You took the words from my mouth. So, just why are
you here?

Beats me. I just woke up here. Maybe my other
personality took over for a bit.
Oh? Is there someone else in there with you?
It was a joke. But it's a common scenario.

Heehee, I see you haven't changed. You really don't
know why you're here, do you? I'll show you the way.
To where?

The exit, of course. That is, unless you want to stay
here. It doesn't matter to me.
School life forever? Think I'll pass.
I was kidding. Now, this way.
Um, sure...

Hey...you said you'd show me the way, but since when
did you become familiar with the academy, Violet?

Only just recently. You could say I'm your "neighbor"
now.

"Neighbor?" You do know I live in the dormitory,
right?
I do. My new landlord is quite the worrier, you see.
Landlord?

Yes. But that's my business, so never mind.
I normally wouldn't say anything, but she's
a bit of a handful.
A bit of a handful....

Correct. She's still quite weak, enough so that she
needs my help.

What does being weak or strong have to do with
being a landlord?

Well, wouldn't you prefer one who's strong? As a
lodger, that provides a better sense of security.
True enough.

...Hey, how much longer? We've been walking for
a while.
Don't be impatient. It's just a bit further.
Maybe you're actually just lost.
Oh, why would you say that?

Just a hunch. Since it feels like we're retracing
our steps.

Heehee, so you figured it out. Truth be told, I was
buying time to speak to you longer.

Then why not just head to the exit once we finished
talking?

I would very much love to do so...but I'm not sure
when I'll be able to leave this academy.
...But alas.
Huh?

Our little chat is at an end, I'm afraid.
Here we are.

...This is the door to a classroom. Shouldn't it be
the school gates?

No, this is the right place. Well, time to say
goodbye.
Right... Thanks again. See you.
...I'll be watching over you, always.
Huh?!
...Cid! Wake up!!!
Huh...? Claire? What gives?

Don't you "what gives" me! I told you we're going
out today, did I not?!
Oh...right. But this is my room...
No place is off limits to a concerned sister.

(Not even being sick is gonna make her change her
ways, huh.)

It's no use trying to weasel your way out of it.
You can't get out of your promises to me so easily.
I'm always going to watch over you, understood?!
Fine...
...Wait, what?

("Watch over me"... Why does it feel like someone
else said the same thing...?)
Cid? Did you hear me?
Um, sure...

Then hurry up and get ready. Our plans aren't
canceled just because you overslept.
Don't worry, I get it.
Do you? I don't think you realize how much you've
...Agh, my left hand...!

(Hm, a sudden pain in the hand. A classic symptom.
The timing is too good...)

You go and rest for a bit. I'll get changed in the
meantime.

(It's best to not bring it up. The perfect response
to avoid wounding a delicate adolescent heart!)
Cid...thank you. I'll go get some air outside.
(Now, while Claire's out there waiting, I'll)

(...Why did it feel like I was being watched just
then?)

Hmm... Ah, whatever. I'm sure it'll come back to me
if it's really important.
...Yes, I'm watching.
Watching the fates of you both...
